title: [Self-directed] Development and Implementation Process of an Educational Feedback Perception Scale

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic instructional design and assessment concepts
context.additional_context: Non-degree education program for current practitioners to strengthen job competencies. Experiencing and applying scale development processes using mixed research methods

learning_goals: Learners can explain the procedure for developing an educational feedback perception scale using mixed methods research (exploratory sequential design)
Learners can demonstrate the process of validating scale validity based on factor analysis (EFA/CFA) results
Learners can interpret reliability analysis results of the developed 3-factor structure (mastery, positive emotion, negative emotion)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
